name: Infectonator: Survivors
summary: "Infectonator : Survivors" is a Randomized Permadeath Survival Simulator that combines RTS, Tower Defense, Roguelike, and Management-Simulation gameplay. The goal is to lead a group of survivors in a struggle to stay alive and find rescue in a zombie apocalyptic world.
info:
• 开发: Toge Productions
  • 发行: Toge Productions
  • 平台: PC
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2016年8月8日
  • 售价: ￥36
  • 官方网站: http://www.togeproductions.com
  • 开发商: Toge Productions
